title: 10 MIN Guided Meditation To Clear Your Mind & Start New Positive Habits
description:
This 10 minute mindful meditation will give you the mental clarity and space necessary to ground yourself with beautiful focus and set your day on the perfect track for success and fulfillment. 

Find a quiet space, put on some headphones & enjoy. 

Click The Link To Join & Begin Your FREE 14 Day Yoga & Meditation Journey! 
https://www.bohobeautiful.life/freeyoga

🚨 Check out our NEW youtube channel dedicated EXCLUSIVELY to Meditations 🚨

channelDescription:
Free yoga videos for the digital yogi. 
Specializing in content highlighting fitness, pilates, vegan food, guided meditations and thoughtful blogs for conscious and mindful living. Boho Beautiful is the creation and beating heart of both Juliana and Mark Spicoluk.

If you are new to the Boho Beautiful family, be ready to experience everything from beginner and intermediate to yin, hatha, ashtanga and so much more.


Your Decisions Today Will Define Your Tomorrow.

comments: To anyone reading this, you are in control of your life, you have purpose and you will be okay
To the person who is reading this, I wish you a calm, successful, and healthy life forever 💕
To anybody who’s reading this, we are going to heal, just trust the process🧘🏻‍♀️☺️🌳🌞

I love coming to the comments after the meditation and seeing everyone encouraging each other. You may have left your comment 3 years ago, 7 months ago, or this morning. But just know your words encouraged someone in the future. LOVE PEACE AND JOY TO EVERYONE
if you are reading this, this year will be better, i promise, im putting all the positive energy writing this, wish u all the best ❤
